question:
Which of the following works will be completed under Bharatmala Pariyojana?
  1. Economic corridors development
  2. Green Field Expressways
  3. Border & International connectivity roads
  4. Coastal & port connectivity roads
Select the correct option from codes given below:
explanation: Bharatmala Pariyojana is a new umbrella program for the highways sector that focuses on optimizing efficiency of freight and passenger movement across the country by bridging critical infrastructure gaps through effective interventions like development of Economic Corridors, Inter Corridors and Feeder Routes, National Corridor Efficiency Improvement, Border and International connectivity roads, Coastal and Port connectivity roads and Green-field expressways. A total of around 24,800 kms are being considered in Phase I. In addition, Phase I also includes 10,000 kms of balance road works under NHDP. This project will have a positive impact on the Logistic Performance Index (LPI) of the country.
